text: Mariyu ihalokanlo (allah) sapam (bahiskaram) varini vembadimpa jeyabadindi mariyu punarut'thana dinamuna kuda (allah sapam varini vembadincagaladu). Vinandi! Nis'sandehanga, ad jativaru tama prabhuvunu tiraskarincaru. Kavuna cusara! Hud jati varaina ad lu ela (allah karunyaniki) duramai poyaro
